Various face skin parameter evaluate cream use ( baseline ) , 6 12 week cream use . DOC.brief_title: Influence Cream With Silver Fir Wood Extract ( Belinal ) Skin
DOC.detailed_description: Objective study determine influence cream Silver fir wood ( Abies alba ) extract ( Belinal ; 2 % cream ) skin parameter function comparison placebo cream . 10 healthy female subject use test cream one half placebo cream half face gluteal area ( split-face split-gluteal area ) twice day 12 week . Face skin parameter evaluate cream use ( baseline ) , 6 12 week cream use . The photoprotective potential Belinal evaluate determination minimal erythema dose ( MED ) gluteal area ( baseline ) 12 week cream use . Comparison do mean individual ratio . The difference before-after condition analyze statistical test analysis variance . In case failure find homogeneity variance nonparametric ANOVA , Willcoxon test , use . The result express mean Â± standard error group significance level 0.05 statistical test .
DOC.criteria: Signs skin age ( mimic wrinkles/ fine lines/ poor skin tone/ photoaged skin ) , Phototype II III . Allergy ingredient test product Diagnosed diabetes Thyroid disease Inflammatory dermatoses Regular use dietary supplement 6 month less start study , Invasive rejuvenation treatment ( botox injection , hyaluronic acid filler , needle roller , needle mesotherapy , etc . ) 6 month less prior start study , Noninvasive rejuvenation treatment ( radiofrequency , electrotherapy , ultrasound therapy , noneedle mesotherapy , etc . ) 3 month less prior start study , Regular , least 14 day use antiaging cosmetic product contain peptides/ polyphenols/ stem cell extracts/ vitamin high concentration/ AHAs/ BHAs/ vitamin A derivative ) three month less prior start study , Gluteal hyperpigmentation , Expected sunbathing ( also solariums ) within study period .
